# Problem 11.18 {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A beam of length L = 10 ft is subjected to a distributed load as shown where w<sub>0</sub> = 50 kip/ft. Determine the magnitude of the deflection at x = 0.5L. Assume EI = 45,000 kip-ft<sup>2</sup>.
